summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Cross-Chain Yield Farming Aggregator. All core functionality working perfectly with excellent backend API performance and smooth frontend integration.

design_issues.issue: External cryptocurrency logos blocked by CORS policy
design_issues.description: Console shows 'net::ERR_BLOCKED_BY_RESPONSE.NotSameOrigin' errors for cryptologos.cc images
design_issues.impact: Minor - logos don't display but functionality unaffected

passed_tests: All 10 backend API endpoints (100% success rate)
Analytics overview cards display correct data
All 4 main tabs functional (Pools, Portfolio, Arbitrage, AI Optimizer)
Chain filtering functionality (8 pools â†’ 6 when filtered to Ethereum)
All interactive buttons clickable and responsive
Real-time data updates when switching tabs/filters

action_item_for_E1: Consider hosting cryptocurrency logos locally or using a different image CDN to avoid CORS issues. Current functionality is not impacted, but logos would improve visual appeal.
